name: Marzo Best Offer LM7
description: Located on a wonderful street in one of the most elegant areas of the city, near Plaza de la Cibeles, one of the most important monuments in Madrid, and steps from Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Gran Vía, and Retreat Newly installed Air Conditioning Perfect location to discover all the cultural offerings that Madrid offers (Prado Museum, Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, Reina Sofía Museum, Royal Palace...) and stroll along the Gran Vía, and even see some of the fantastic shows of its theaters and cinemas. In addition, it is very close to the Retiro Park, the lung of the capital, where you can spend a pleasant time enjoying its terraces, taking a boat ride around its pond, sunbathing, enjoying rollerblading or cycling. Apartment recently renovated and decorated by a prestigious interior design team, it has several comfortable rooms, a separate kitchen and bathrooms.

name: Valencia Grand Suite
description: Exclusive luxury apartment in front of Malvarrosa beach, with spectacular views of the Mediterranean Sea. It has a large terrace, a high-end equipped kitchen and avant-garde design spaces.

name: Villa Pescaito
description: Located 1.7 km from Playa Nueva Andalucía, Villa Pescaito offers accommodation in Marbella with access to a hot tub. This holiday home also features a private pool and free WiFi. This air-conditioned house or chalet is made up of 6 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and 4 bathrooms. TV is offered. Cortijo Blanco Beach is 2.2 km from the accommodation, and Praia do Rio Verde is 2.4 km.

name: Villa Casablanca
description: Located 1.7 km from Playa Nueva Andalucía, Casablanca offers accommodation in Marbella with access to a hot tub. This holiday home also features a private pool and free WiFi. This air-conditioned house or chalet is made up of 6 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and 4 bathrooms. TV is offered. Cortijo Blanco Beach is 2.2 km from the accommodation, and Praia do Rio Verde is 2.4 km.

name: Villa Barceloneta
description: Featuring city views, Barcelona Beach Home offers accommodation with a balcony and a kettle, about a 5-minute walk from Platja de Sant Miquel. This beachfront property offers free private parking, free WiFi and access to a terrace. This air-conditioned house or chalet consists of 6 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a refrigerator and a coffee machine, and 4 bathrooms with a bidet and a shower. There are towels and bed linen in the house or chalet. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Platja de la Barceloneta, Platja de Sant Sebastià and Santa María del Mar.
